game.name: Train Valley
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build railways, manage traffic and stay accident-free. Play in Europe, America, Japan and USSR in 1830-2020. Complete the story mode from the Gold Rush of 1849 to the first manned spaceflight, and then explore the random mode. Management. Construction. Trains. Welcome to Train Valley!
